column4: help I used the ubuntu live-cd and now all i have is a terminal and no interface
i did but nothing happened just a blank screen
You might need to install Gnome.
However I think it's better to first open a post in the forums and see if some can help, if not come back to me and I'll explain to you how to install the Gnome.
sorry i am using a live dc will it still work?
What will work, I don't get you?
i am using the live CD i thought gnome is already installed
You might have chosen not to install Gnome. I have tried the Live CD, I use minimal CD, so I'm not sure what you might have done.
Get a piece of paper and I'll tell you what to do. OK?
First you might want to isntall an IRC client incase if you had any problems. So write down sudo apt-get install irssi (To run it after installation just type irssi)
sudo apt-get -y instsall gnome-core gdm x11-xserver-utils gnome-utils
